Intro to the Website

This is the official Bible Study Website of LightCity Teaching Fellowship. Please see the About Us page to know more about us.

A Prayer for You

May God, the Only True God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, in the Holy Name of Jesus Christ His Son and Holy Servant strengthen your heart in His Truth.
May He give you a willing heart to obey Him and walk in all His ways.
May He give you a sincere and pure desire to know Him in Truth.
May He guard your heart and deliver you from the deception of the enemy.
May He grant you true devotion to Him, placing Him and His Truths above all other considerations.
May He give you a heart that trembles at His Word.
May He save you from lies and false doctrines of all kinds, mainstream and fringe, ancient and recent, obvious and subtle.
May He save you from the wayward wife who has left the Husband of her youth and may you never be numbered among her children.

01 Mar 2024.

Sure Mercies of David

The “sure mercies of David” is how God described the promise and covenant that he made with King David. We find this definition in his words through the prophet Isaiah [Isa 55:3 KJV]. The phrase is translated differently in different translations.God originally gave this promise and covenant to David through...

06 Dec 2023.

Habakkuk—The Wrath and Justice of YAHWEH

The Glory of Yahweh will be Revealed [Hab 2:14] God will destroy the labour of the nations with fire [Hab 2:13] They will have no legacy. The Wicked (antichrist) will build up his realm with unjust gain and his city with bloodshed and his town by crime piling up stolen goods and making himself rich...

read more

category: Bible-Commentaries  

06 Dec 2023.

Micah—Eschatology

Israel and Judah have to leave the land of their inheritance because they have defiled it [Mic 2:10; 3:10; 6:16] Zion, Jerusalem and the temple will be reduced to nothing [Mic 3:12]
